title: Adirondack Timetable
heading: Amtrak's Adirondack
top_text:
As of July 2023 the Adirondack has been intermittently suspended north of Albany.
Always check Amtrak.com for your exact date of travel.

Appropriate documentation (passports, visas, etc.) is needed to cross the US-Canadian border.
See government websites for details.
